Posts.Content: My doctor wanted me to have mammogram done when I was 26, when I went to have it done they asked if there was a chance that I was pregnant and at the time there was, so they did a ultrasound, I was told that by the technician that at my age a ultrasound is better becasue at a younger age our breasts ae more dense.
Posts.Title: mammogram vs. ultrasound

Posts.Content: I have been having breast pain (right breast) quite a bit lately. I had ultrasound done about 2 years ago on that breast and they found nothing. My doctor thought that it was cystic fibrous, and that it was nothing to worry about. I am not sure if the pain just comes before my period or not. I felt around for any lumps, I feel some, but from what I am told, women do have lumps in there breast. I recently went throught some major health problems, and I am not sure if I am paronoid. Any suggestions or info???
Posts.Title: Breast Pain
